abstract: Verizon Communications is in talks with Vodafone to buy the British telecommunication giant’s 45% stake in Verizon Wireless. The deal, worth at least $125 billion, would be one of the biggest takeovers in history, but the burgeoning wireless industry makes the buyout attractive.

lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications is in talks with Vodafone to buy the British telecommunication giant’s 45% stake in Verizon Wireless. The deal, worth at least $125 billion, would be one of the biggest takeovers in history, but the burgeoning wireless industry makes the buyout attractive.

headline.main: Week in Review: A $125 Billion Bet on a Multitrillion-Dollar Market
